      (package private) DatasetRecord MatrixAggregate.ahead_buffer
      collections of variables to organzie the computatio record: the current read record from input previous: the row _read_ before the curren record lastAggregated: last row used to update the aggregators ahead_buffer: the row read after a change of value in groupby

      internal buffer holding the next output row, which is prepared in advance.
